${modID}:HeadsUpDisplay.NAME: Heads-Up Display
${modID}:HeadsUpDisplay.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Lock-On to ALL enemies. NL Enemies with Lock-On take 75% more damage from Orbs rather than 50%.

${modID}:Iteration.NAME: Iteration
${modID}:Iteration.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, trigger the passive ability of your next Orb. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Iteration.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, trigger the passive ability of your next Orb.

${modID}:HardLightBarrier.NAME: Hard-Light Barrier
${modID}:HardLightBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a 0 cost card, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:Cryogenics.NAME: Cryogenics
${modID}:Cryogenics.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Evoke a Frost Orb, draw 1 card.

${modID}:Ping.NAME: Ping
${modID}:Ping.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive ability of all Orbs.

${modID}:Dequeue.NAME: Dequeue
${modID}:Dequeue.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Evoke your leftmost Orb.

${modID}:Malware.NAME: Malware
${modID}:Malware.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Dark. NL Add a Void into your discard pile.

${modID}:EventHorizon.NAME: Event Horizon
${modID}:EventHorizon.DESCRIPTION: Evoke all Dark orbs. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:EventHorizon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive ability of all Dark orbs. NL Evoke all Dark orbs. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PowerCell.NAME: Power Cell
${modID}:PowerCell.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Power card, gain [E].
${modID}:PowerCell.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you draw a Power card, gain [E].

${modID}:Firewall.NAME: Firewall
${modID}:Firewall.DESCRIPTION: The first time you draw a Status card each turn, Exhaust it and draw 1 card.
${modID}:Firewall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first two times you draw a Status card each turn, Exhaust it and draw 1 card.

${modID}:TrialAndError.NAME: Trial and Error
${modID}:TrialAndError.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, Upgrade it for the rest of combat.
${modID}:TrialAndError.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a card, Upgrade it for the rest of combat.

${modID}:BetaTesting.NAME: Beta Testing
${modID}:BetaTesting.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you Channel an Orb, trigger the passive ability of that Orb twice.
${modID}:BetaTesting.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Channel an Orb, trigger the passive ability of that Orb twice.

${modID}:RNG.NAME: RNG
${modID}:RNG.DESCRIPTION: Play the top X cards of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:RNG.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play the top X+1 cards of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Bide.NAME: Bide
${modID}:Bide.DESCRIPTION: Your next Attack deals !M! additional damage.

${modID}:Salvage.NAME: Salvage
${modID}:Salvage.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! cards from your discard pile into your hand.

${modID}:Stockpile.NAME: Stockpile
${modID}:Stockpile.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Increase the amount drawn by this card by 1 this combat.

${modID}:Ambrosia.NAME: Ambrosia
${modID}:Ambrosia.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card and Upgrade it for the rest of combat.
${modID}:Ambrosia.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards and Upgrade them for the rest of combat.

${modID}:Jackpot.NAME: Jackpot
${modID}:Jackpot.DESCRIPTION: Draw X cards. NL Gain !M! [E]. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:HiddenCache.NAME: Hidden Cache
${modID}:HiddenCache.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional cards.

${modID}:Radiance.NAME: Radiance
${modID}:Radiance.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card, deal damage equal to its cost to a random enemy.
${modID}:Radiance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you draw a card, deal damage equal to its cost to a random enemy.

${modID}:ArcaneWard.NAME: Arcane Ward
${modID}:ArcaneWard.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Prevent the next time you would lose HP. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ArcaneWard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you would lose HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Dispel.NAME: Dispel
${modID}:Dispel.DESCRIPTION: Remove all your Debuffs. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Patience.NAME: Patience
${modID}:Patience.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! card. NL Whenever this card is Retained, increase its draw by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Patience.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Whenever this card is Retained, increase its draw by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FollowThrough.NAME: Follow Through
${modID}:FollowThrough.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Retain your hand this turn.

${modID}:Foreshadow.NAME: Foreshadow
${modID}:Foreshadow.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, ALL enemies lose HP equal to the number of cards Retained this turn.
${modID}:Foreshadow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, ALL enemies lose HP equal to the number of cards Retained this turn.

${modID}:ForetellingStrike.NAME: Foretelling Strike
${modID}:ForetellingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Deal !D! damage for each card discarded.

${modID}:Counterattack.NAME: Counterattack
${modID}:Counterattack.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for each time you Scry this turn. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:EbbAndFlow.NAME: Ebb and Flow
${modID}:EbbAndFlow.DESCRIPTION: The first time you Scry each turn, draw 1 card.
${modID}:EbbAndFlow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first two times you Scry each turn, draw 1 card.

${modID}:Suppress.NAME: Suppress
${modID}:Suppress.DESCRIPTION: Exit your Stance. NL Reenter the Stance you exited at the start of your next turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Condemn.NAME: Condemn
${modID}:Condemn.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Mantra equal to the unblocked damage dealt. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Condemn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Mantra equal to the unblocked damage dealt. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ShieldOfFaith.NAME: Shield of Faith
${modID}:ShieldOfFaith.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Mantra, gain !M! block.

${modID}:SplitReality.NAME: Split Reality
${modID}:SplitReality.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Smite or *Safety into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SplitReality.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Smite or *Safety into your hand.

${modID}:GlimpseFuture.NAME: Glimpse Future
${modID}:GlimpseFuture.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Add !M! *Insights into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:GlimpseFuture.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Insights into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PlantFeet.NAME: Plant Feet
${modID}:PlantFeet.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle an *On *Solid *Ground into your draw pile.

${modID}:OnSolidGround.NAME: On Solid Ground
${modID}:OnSolidGround.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PierceTheVeil.NAME: Pierce the Veil
${modID}:PierceTheVeil.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is created during combat, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:GraspPotential.NAME: Grasp Potential
${modID}:GraspPotential.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next colorless card you play this turn is played twice.

${modID}:Juke.NAME: Juke
${modID}:Juke.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Dexterity.

${modID}:UncannyDodge.NAME: Uncanny Dodge
${modID}:UncannyDodge.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Dexterity.

${modID}:Smokescreen.NAME: Smokescreen
${modID}:Smokescreen.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards. NL Gain !B! Block for each card discarded.

${modID}:Blindside.NAME: Blindside
${modID}:Blindside.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you discard a card, return this card from the discard pile to your Hand.

${modID}:Trace.NAME: Trace
${modID}:Trace.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, put a card from your discard pile into your hand.
${modID}:Trace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, put !M! cards from your discard pile into your hand.

${modID}:Feint.NAME: Feint
${modID}:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Add 2 *Shivs into your hand.

${modID}:BladeBarrier.NAME: Blade Barrier
${modID}:BladeBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of *Shivs played this combat. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:BladeBarrier.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of *Shivs played this combat +3. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Trickshot.NAME: Trickshot
${modID}:Trickshot.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Shivs into your hand. NL *Shivs now hit ALL enemies.

${modID}:Relentless.NAME: Relentless
${modID}:Relentless.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At the start of your turn, return this card from the discard pile to your hand.

${modID}:HoneBlade.NAME: Hone Blade
${modID}:HoneBlade.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Upgrade a random card in your hand for the rest of combat.
${modID}:HoneBlade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Upgrade !M! random cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

${modID}:LashOut.NAME: Lash Out
${modID}:LashOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Whenever you Exhaust this card, return it to your hand and increase its hits by 1 this combat.

${modID}:Tenacity.NAME: Tenacity
${modID}:Tenacity.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for each card exhausted this combat. NL Gain !B! Block.
